ISSUE: App can read/write to External Storage. Any App can read data written to External Storage.
STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-276: Incorrect Default Permissions                        OWASP Top 10: M2: Insecure Data Storage                        OWASP MASVS: MSTG-STORAGE-2
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_read_write_external in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan                         Suppress the rule android_read_write_external in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan only from these files

ISSUE: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File                                               OWASP MASVS: MSTG-STORAGE-3
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_logging in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan                         Suppress the rule android_logging in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan only from these files

ISSUE: This App uses SQL Cipher. SQLCipher provides 256-bit AES encryption to sqlite database files.
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_sql_cipher_aes256 in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan                         Suppress the rule android_sql_cipher_aes256 in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan only from these files

ISSUE: The App uses the encryption mode CBC with PKCS5/PKCS7 padding. This configuration is vulnerable to padding oracle attacks.
STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-649: Reliance on Obfuscation or Encryption of Security-Relevant Inputs without Integrity Checking                        OWASP Top 10: M5: Insufficient Cryptography                        OWASP MASVS: MSTG-CRYPTO-3
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule cbc_padding_oracle in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan                         Suppress the rule cbc_padding_oracle in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan only from these files

ISSUE: The App uses an insecure Random Number Generator.
STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values                        OWASP Top 10: M5: Insufficient Cryptography                        OWASP MASVS: MSTG-CRYPTO-6
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_insecure_random in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan                         Suppress the rule android_insecure_random in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan only from these files

ISSUE: Debug configuration enabled. Production builds must not be debuggable.
STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-919: Weaknesses in Mobile Applications                        OWASP Top 10: M1: Improper Platform Usage                        OWASP MASVS: MSTG-RESILIENCE-2
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_aar_jar_debug_enabled in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan                         Suppress the rule android_aar_jar_debug_enabled in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan only from these files

ISSUE: MD5 is a weak hash known to have hash collisions.
STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm                        OWASP Top 10: M5: Insufficient Cryptography                        OWASP MASVS: MSTG-CRYPTO-4
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_md5 in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan                         Suppress the rule android_md5 in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan only from these files

ISSUE: This App uses SSL certificate pinning to detect or  prevent MITM attacks in secure communication channel.
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_ssl_pinning in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan                         Suppress the rule android_ssl_pinning in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan only from these files

ISSUE: App uses SQLite Database and execute raw SQL query. Untrusted user input in raw SQL queries can cause SQL Injection. Also sensitive information should be encrypted and written to the database.
STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')                        OWASP Top 10: M7: Client Code Quality
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_sql_raw_query in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan                         Suppress the rule android_sql_raw_query in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan only from these files
Suppress the rule android_safetynet in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan                         Suppress the rule android_safetynet in com.aqsmartphone.android.nissan only from these files
